fullText:
Wild Sage

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Trained in Nature
Benefit: You gain a +5 feat bonus to Nature knowledge checks and to monster knowledge checks to identify a natural creatures.
In addition, choose one of the following rituals: Dowsing Rod, Portend Weather, or Travelerâ€™s Camouflage. You master that ritual and can perform it once per day without a ritual book and without expending components.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 143.
name: Wild Sage
